content.question: The characterization of the traditional Chinese marriage system in Article 1 most likely reflects which of the following?

choices.label: Chinese nationalists’ emphasis on the unity of Chinese territory
The influence of Buddhist teachings on Chinese culture
Chinese elites’ adoption of Western gender norms following the Opium Wars
The Marxist ideology of Mao Zedong’s government in China

content.answer: The Marxist ideology of Mao Zedong’s government in China

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
